Class TaxiMenu

java.lang.Object
  draw.TaxiMenu

public class TaxiMenu
extends java.lang.Object

Class for drawing the taxi menu Draws the triplist menu Colour codes are used as indicater Thick line is indicating which trip is currently selected

Nicolai
